show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: Health Care Outrage Part 2
content:
Prices in the medical industry are high because the government needs them to be high to goose GDP numbers and,... <!--more--> hopefully for them, to drive up inflation so as to pay off the debt with cheapened dollars.
It won’t work.
Costs should probably be about 10% of what they are in reality.
Washington simply created an enormous insurance pool for an uninsurable service and then invited the medical profession to morph into the beltway’s greatest crony capitalist lobby.
The American Medical Association, for instance, fell on its sword in opposition to LBJ’s original legislation.
Yet by 2010 it sold its soul in support of Obamacare in exchange for a more doc-friendly regime, the very thing which will cause the cost of Obamacare to balloon in the years ahead.
The long-term unemployment situation is worsening.
The stereotype about women being taken advantage of more than men is true.
